channel.title: Berky-Scape Issue
channel.description:
Has anyone found a way to fix this HUGE bug on Berky-Scape. The bug is, when you trade, the interfaces become messed up, and no one can offer anything... it doesn't recognize the inventory as an interface.
If anyone has found a solution to this, let me know - I've tried everything :-(.

item.title: Berky-Scape Issue
item.dc:creator: @bode bode
item.description:
@bode wrote:

Has anyone found a way to fix this HUGE bug on Berky-Scape. The bug is, when you trade, the interfaces become messed up, and no one can offer anything… it doesn’t recognize the inventory as an interface.

If anyone has found a solution to this, let me know - I’ve tried everything :-(.

Read full topic
